member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.Log4NetHelper.Configure
member.summary: http://logging.apache.org/log4net/release/manual/configuration.html

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.XrmBaseConstants
member.summary: Hilfsklasse für Globale Konstaten.

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail
member.summary: One instance contains all information required to establish a connection to any CRM installation. Should be populated using a connection file or the . Will be serialized as part of the .

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.connectionfinished
member.summary: Indicates whether the connection is successfully established. null - not yet finished connecting true - successfully connected false - connection failed

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.ConnectionName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the displayname for this connection. May be set to anything.
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.UniqueOrgName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the unique organization name. For online organizations this may be a slightly cryptic name.
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.ServerName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the server ip or dns name of the crm server. NO HTTP/S or www prefixes nor any suffix, just 192.168.247.18 or something like that.
Should always be set, except for O365 deployment type.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.ServerPort
member.summary:
The servers port where the crm organization is accessible.
May be empty if server port is 80.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.UseSsl
member.summary: Determines whether to use HTTP or HTTPS. Default: false

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.IsCustomAuth
member.summary: Determines whether to use default credentials or provided ones. Default: true

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.UserDomain
member.summary:
Gets or sets the user's domain used to login.
Should always be set, except for O365 deployment type.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.UserName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the user name used to login. For O365 make sure to use the e-mail address.
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.UserPassword
member.summary:
Gets or sets the users password used to login. Always use to save an encrypted password here.
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.SavePassword
member.summary:
Determines if the password shall be saved. This is used somewhere within the microsoft component. Default: true
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.CrmDeploymentType
member.summary:
Gets or sets the deployment type for this connection. Default: Prem
O365 - for online
Prem - for on premise and IFD
Online - for ??
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.SqlServerIpOrName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the server ip or dns name of the sql server. NO HTTP/S or www prefixes nor any suffix, just 192.168.247.18 or something like that.
Should only be set for OnPremise as this is only used by internal BuildTools like the CrmDevManager.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.SolutionName
member.summary:
Gets or sets the uniquename of a solution which is part of the crm organization
Should only be set for OnPremise as this is only used by internal BuildTools like the git hooks.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.ExportOnCommit
member.summary:
Determines whether to export and version the configured as part of a git commit. Default: false
Should only be set for OnPremise as this is only used by internal BuildTools like the git hooks.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the timeout for a connection in milliseconds. Default: 2 minutes.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.TimeoutTicks
member.summary:
Gets or sets the timeout for a connection in milliseconds. Default: 2 minutes. This property only exists as fassade for xmlserialization for TimeSpan objects.
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.Authority
member.summary: Gets or sets the connections authority. TODO: What is Authority used for? not set for Prem, IFD, O365

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.AuthHomeRealm
member.summary:
Gets or sets the connections auth home realm. TODO: Possible values: - "Active Directory" for OnPremise and Online - "Internet-facing deployment(IFD)" for IFD - *** for OAuth?
Should always be set.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.CrmOnlineRegion
member.summary: Gets or sets the online region. Possible values: - "EMEA" (means: Europe, Middle East, Asia)

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.AdvancedCheck
member.summary: Gets or sets the flag to execute an advanced check. Default: false. This should be true for Online else false.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.WriteBufferPackageSize
member.summary: Current Size of the WriteBuffer

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.PasswordIsEmpty
member.summary: Gets if the is empty.

member.summary: Creates a new instance based on the .
member.param: Used to populate the new instance.
member.returns: The new instance.

member.summary: Populates the current instance based on the .
member.param: Used to populate the current instance.
member.returns: The current instance for the sake of the fluent interface.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.ToConfigFileServerKeys
member.summary: Parses the current values to a new Dictionary which can be used in a . will only be added if not empty.
member.returns: New Dictionary instance holding the values populates in the current instance.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.SetPassword(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the property if is not empty. If is set to true, the password won't be encrypted before saving it.
member.param: The password to encrypt and save.
If false, password will be encrypted before saving it.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.Connect(System.Int32,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Creates a new instance using the details provides within this instance, tries to establish a connection and returns the newly created instance.
member.param: Timeout in seconds to wait for the connection to be established.
member.returns: A new and already connected instance.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.Connect(Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.CrmConnectControl.CrmConnectionManager,System.Int32)
member.summary: Uses the to establish a new connection. Waits a maximum of seconds before cancelling active checking, if connection was successfully established. Returns true, if connection was successfully established, else false.
member.param: Used to connect to the crm. Will contain the connected service in the property.
Timeout in seconds to wait for the connection to be established.
member.returns: True, if connection was successfully established.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.cManager_CheckCompleted(System.Object,Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.CrmConnectControl.ServerConnectStatusEventArgs)
member.summary: Eventhandler that will be fired if the connection establish process was finished. contains the information saying if establishing was successfull.
member.param: A instance.
Information about the connection status.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.cManager_ConnectionUpdated(System.Object,Microsoft.Xrm.Tooling.CrmConnectControl.ServerConnectStatusEventArgs)
member.summary: Eventhandler that will be fired once in a while establishing a connection. contains the information saying if establishing was successfull.
member.param: A instance.
Information about the current connection status.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new instance as a complete clone of the current instance.
member.returns: The newly create instance.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionDetail.GetClientCredentials
member.summary: Creates a new instance having the credentials set as within this class. This may be used to create a DeploymentServiceClient, see examble below, which is used to activate/deactivate/... organizations, etc.
member.example: DeploymentServiceClient serviceClient = ProxyClientHelper.CreateClient(new Uri("http://" + connectionDetail.ServerName + "/XRMDeployment/2011/Deployment.svc"), new TimeSpan(0, 20, 0)); serviceClient.ClientCredentials.Windows.ClientCredential = connectionDetail.GetClientCredentials();
member.returns: New instance of s.

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionRepositorySettings
member.summary: XmlRoot for the connections file. Holds a list of all configured connections and other global settings. Will be used to de/serialized the connections file.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionRepositorySettings.DefaultConnectionIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the 0-based index which determines the connection that shall be considered as default.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.ConnectionRepositorySettings.ConnectionsList
member.summary: Gets a list of all connections configured within the file.

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository
member.summary: Manages the list of all configured crm connections, like - de/serializing the connections file, - prompting the user to select a connection, - providing a default connection.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.DefaultConnection
member.summary: Gets the default connection instance. If exactly one connection is contained within the , then this connection will be returned. If a is set to a value less than the count of configured connections, then this connection will be returned.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.SelectedConnection
member.summary: Gets the currently selection connection instance. By default will use the . May be overriden by the user. The connection set to this property will automatically be added to the .

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.ConnectionsList
member.summary: Gets the list of all configured connections.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.Settings
member.summary:
Gets or sets the global settings instance which will be de/serialized to the connections file. Automatically populates on first access.
This is private to have a better control over de/serializing and setting the .

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.DefaultConnectionFileName
member.summary: Default filename for the connections file.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.FileName
member.summary: Gets or set the path and name of the file where the connections shall be loaded from / saved to.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.SaveToFile
member.summary: Serializes the current to the .

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.Refresh
member.summary: Deserializes the file and populates the values to the property.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.LoadFromFile
member.summary: Deserializes the as a new instance and returns the value. If the file does not exist, a new, empty instance will be returned.
member.returns: A new instance.

member.name: M:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmConnectionRepository.SelectConnection
member.summary: Prompts the user to select a connection from a list of connections. If the connectionslist is empty or the user decides to add a new connection a dialog will be opened. If user cannot be prompted, because program is running as a service, the will be returned. If user selected a connection the will be set to that connection, but not yet connected.
member.returns: The selected connection instance.

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.RunMode
member.summary: Verschiedene Laufverhalten - einmalige ausführung im Haput, sowie in einem nebenläufigen Thread oder intervallgesteuert in einer Endlosschleife.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.RunMode.RunOnce
member.summary: Logic will be run once in the main thread.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.RunMode.RunOnceInSeparateThread
member.summary: Logic will be run once, but a new thread will be spawned.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.RunMode.RunInLoop
member.summary: the logic will loop, respecting the set intervall and running in a seperate thread.

member.name: T:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration
member.summary: Klasse zum speichern von Konfigurationen einer Anwendung

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.MimimumHeartBeatIntervall
member.summary: Das minimale zeitintervall zwischen zwei heartbeats. Bei schneller aufeinanderfolgenden Anfragen werden keine Heartbeats gesendet. Default: 5 Seconds.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.respectDateTimeRunSuccessInformation
member.summary: Determines whether the logic should check for the ".lastrun"-con_config to see, if something went wrong the last run. Default: true.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.AdditionalArguments
member.summary: Zusätzliche Argumente der Kommandozeile.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.SyncIntervall
member.summary: Wartezeit zwischen zwei Logic-Durchläufen in Sekunden. Default: 300.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration._SystemContextAllowed
member.summary: Interne Speichervariablen, ob System-context für die Logic erlaubt ist.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.CanBeRunInSystemContext
member.summary: Legt fest, ob die Logik als "Netzwerkdienst" oder "Lokales System" ausgeführt werden darf - generiert Warnung, falls dies dennoch der Fall ist. Default: true.

member.name: P:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.UseHeartBeat
member.summary: Determines whether the current running logic is using heartbeat-mechanic or not. Default: true.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.AppConfiguration.UDPPort
member.summary: Legt den Port für UDP-Heartbeats fest. Default: -1.

member.summary: Lock to protect the service from subsequent calls, if an impersonation was set.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmServiceConnection.retryExceptionTypes
member.summary: Enable retry mechanic on the following exception types. Default: TimeoutException. If a service request fails with such type of an exception it will be reissued after waiting a short moment.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmServiceConnection.TimeOutWaitSeconds
member.summary: Time to wait between retrying a CRM-call in case a timeout occured. Default 120 seconds.

member.name: F:Connectiv.XrmCommon.CrmServiceConnection.NumberOfTimeoutRetries
member.summary: Number of Retries for Timeouts on CRM-Calls (0 for none, -1 for infinite). Default: 0
